abilities.name: Call Bell
abilities.description: Throw out a call bell that deals spirit damage on impact. After a short delay it explodes, dealing additional spirit damage and causing reduced weapon accuracy and movement slow.

abilities.name: Doorway
abilities.description: Place two connected doors in the world. Players and most projectiles entering one door will exit through the other.

upgrades.effect: Grants Barrier first time traveling through doors

abilities.name: Luggage Cart
abilities.description: Send out a luggage cart that deals spirit damage and pulls enemy heroes along its path. Can be alt-cast to target friendly heroes instead.

upgrades.effect: +45 Cart Damage, 117 Damage and 1.2s stun on wall impact

abilities.name: Hotel Guest
abilities.description: Send the target's physical body to the Baroness Hotel. The guest must make their way to the exit elevator for return. Failure to check-out on time costs additional spirit damage.
